contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=January 2009}} {{Infobox Officeholder | name= Maeda Toshinaga | nationality=Japanese | image=Maeda Toshinaga.jpg | order=[[Kaga Domain|Lord of Kaga]] | term_start=1599 | term_end=1605 | predecessor= [[Maeda Toshiie]] | successor= [[Maeda Toshitsune]] | birth_date={{birth date|1562|2|15|mf=y}} | birth_place=[[Arako]], [[Japan]] | death_date={{death date and age|1614|6|27|1562|2|15|mf=y}}, aged {{age|1562|2|15|1615|6|27}} | death_place= | spouse= [[Ei-hime]] }} {{Japanese name|Maeda}} '''{{nihongo|Maeda Toshinaga|前田 利長||extra=February 15, 1562 – June 27, 1614}}''' was a Japanese [[daimyo]] who was the second head of the [[Kaga Domain]]. He was the eldest son of [[Maeda Toshiie]] and married one of [[Oda Nobunaga]]'s daughters, [[Ei-hime]]. He supported [[Tokugawa Ieyasu]], and, after receiving his brother [[Maeda Toshimasa (2nd)|Toshimasa]]'s lands ([[Noto Province|Noto]], 215,000 koku), controlled a total of 1,250,000 koku, an amount exceeded only by the Shogunate. Toshinaga built and resided in [[Kanazawa Castle]]. He had no children and adopted his brother [[Maeda Toshitsune|Toshitsune]] as his heir. ==Family== *Father: [[Maeda Toshiie]] (1539-1599) *Mother: [[Maeda Matsu]] (1547-1617) *Siblings: ** [[Maeda Toshimasa (2nd)|Maeda Toshimasa]] ** [[Maeda Toshitsune]] (1594-1658) (also adopted son) ** [[Maeda Toshitaka]] (1594-1637) ** [[Maeda Toshitoyo]] ** [[Maeda Kō]] ** [[Maeda Ma'a]] ** [[Maeda Gō]] ** [[Maeda Chise]] {{openhistory}} [[Image:Maeda Toshinaga (bronze statue).jpg|thumb|left|Statue of Maeda Toshinaga]] {{S-start}} {{succession box | title=1st [[Kaga han|(Maeda) lord of Kaga]] | before=[[Maeda Toshiie]] | after= [[Maeda Toshitsune]]| years=1599-1605}} {{S-end}} {{Persondata | name = Maeda Toshinaga | alternative names = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Daimyo | date of birth = February 15, 1562 | place of birth = [[Arako]], [[Japan]] | date of death = June 27, 1614 | place of death = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Maeda, Toshinaga}} [[Category:1562 births]] [[Category:1614 deaths]] [[Category:Daimyo]] [[Category:Maeda clan]] [[Category:Oda retainers]] {{Daimyo-stub}}
